Name: Face processing MEEG dataset with HED annotation
ReferencesAndLinks: Wakeman, D., Henson, R. (2015). A multi-subject, multi-modal human neuroimaging dataset. Sci Data 2, 150001. https://doi.org/10.1038/sdata.2015.1

Robbins, K., Truong, D., Appelhoff, S., Delorme, A., & Makeig, S. (2021). Capturing the nature of events and event context using Hierarchical Event Descriptors (HED). In press for NeuroImage Special Issue Practice in MEEG. https://authors.elsevier.com/sd/article/S1053-8119(21)01038-7.

Robbins, K., Truong, D., Jones, A., Callanan, I., & Makeig, S. (2021). Building FAIR functionality: Annotating events in time series data using Hierarchical Event Descriptors (HED). In press for Neuroinformatics Special Issue Building the NeuroCommons. https://doi.org/10.31219/osf.io/5fg73.
